simlib.analysis.peptide.HydrophobicityScale¶

class simlib.analysis.peptide.HydrophobicityScale(scale=None)[source]¶

Store a hydrophobicity scale that can be used for analysis

load(scale)[source]¶

Load scale by name

Parameters

scale (str) – Name of hydrophobicity scale (Default: ‘wimley-white’)
